title: Cosmogony / Creation
description: The foundational narrative of creation. Chronologies diverge significantly between traditional MASORETIC, SEPTUAGINT, and Islamic interpretations.

title: Great Deluge (Noah)
description: Narrative of the global or regional flood. Present in all three scriptures with varying emphasis on the scope of destruction.

title: Merneptah Stele
description: First extra-biblical mention of 'Israel' as a people in Canaan. Critical archaeological anchor for the late dating of the Exodus.

title: The Exodus (Early Dating)
description: The departure from Egypt under Moses. Traditional dating based on 1 Kings 6:1. Conflicts with 'Late Dating' (-1250 BCE) preferred by many archaeologists.

title: Edict of Cyrus
description: Decree allowing the return of exiles from Babylon. Grounded in both Ezra and the archaeological Cyrus Cylinder.

title: Conquest of Makkah
description: The peaceful entry into Makkah by the early Muslim community, solidifying the monotheistic presence in the Hijaz.
